summary: Comprehensive translation scan completed for Collaboration and About pages. Added useTranslation hook to Collaboration component (was missing). Replaced ALL hardcoded text in both components with translation keys. Created 100+ new translation keys for English, Russian, and Turkmen covering every word, paragraph, heading, button, list item, and element in both pages. All translations are professional business quality with correct grammar and terminology.
current_status: Collaboration and About pages are now 100% multilingual. All text elements translated professionally in English, Russian, and Turkmen. Both components fully use i18n system. Ready for production use with complete language support.
